items.title: Acupuncture Eases Chronic Low Back Pain, Boosts Function
items.description: Acupuncture was more effective at improving symptoms of chronic low back pain in older adults compared to usual care, a new clinical trial shows. Meds...

items.title: Women With Alzheimer’s Show Unique Fatty Acid Deficits
items.description: Distinct fatty acid deficits may help explain why Alzheimer’s affects women differently. Medscape Medical News
